Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the actions of the individuals mentioned, such as personal motivations or involvement with other extremist groups, rather than direct affiliation with ISIS.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there have been no confirmed ISIS-related attacks in Texas, as the evidence provided only mentions individuals charged with attempting to provide material support to terrorists, not confirmed incidents of ISIS-related attacks.
